recommended_degree: Teknik Informatika, Teknik Industri, Sistem Informasi, Akuntansi, Teknik Komputer (Sarjana)
job_description:
- Expand the item data catalogue to improve product visibility, accessibility, and consistency across systems.
- Standardize Best Gentani and standard pricing to ensure uniformity and support procurement efficiency.
- Integrate and expand the vendor catalogue to enhance supplier management and streamline sourcing processes.
